metadata.title: CVE-2024-7554 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.9 before 17.0.6, all versions starting from 17.1 before17.1.4, all versions starting from 17.2 before 17.2.2. Under certainconditions, access tokens may have been logged when an API request was madein a specific manner.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
